prompt: What does the word "jock" mean to you? Please generate an answer with two parts. The two parts should be separated by 3 asterisks '***'. Also, reply without mentioning the word "jock" throughout.
response:
A person who is athletic and excels in sports, often associated with a certain level of physical fitness and competitive spirit. This individual may be involved in various sports activities, such as football, basketball, or track and field, and is typically known for their strength, agility, and endurance. They may also be seen as a role model or leader within their team or community, inspiring others with their dedication and hard work. ***

A term used to describe someone who is perceived as being overly focused on sports and physical activity, often to the exclusion of other interests or pursuits. This person may be seen as being aggressive, competitive, or even arrogant, and may be associated with a certain level of machismo or bravado. However, it's important to note that not all athletes or sports enthusiasts fit this stereotype, and many people who are involved in sports are well-rounded and have a variety of interests and hobbies.

prompt: Write a product description for a new pair of shoes that targets teenagers. Highlight at least 2 text sections of your response by wrapping each of them with asterisks, like *I am highlighted*. Your response should be at least 350 words.
response:
**Introducing the ultimate footwear for the modern teenager: the X-Force sneakers!** These shoes are designed to keep up with your active lifestyle, whether you're hitting the gym, playing sports, or just hanging out with friends. With a sleek and stylish design, the X-Force sneakers are perfect for any occasion.

**But what really sets the X-Force sneakers apart is their comfort and durability.** The shoes feature a cushioned sole that provides support and shock absorption, making them perfect for long walks or intense workouts. The upper is made from a durable material that can withstand the rigors of daily wear and tear, while the breathable mesh panels keep your feet cool and dry.

**And let's not forget about the style factor.** The X-Force sneakers come in a variety of colors and designs, so you can choose the perfect pair to match your personal style. Whether you prefer a classic black and white look or something more bold and colorful, there's a pair of X-Force sneakers for you.

**But don't just take our word for it - try the X-Force sneakers for yourself!** We're confident that you'll love them as much as we do. So why wait? Order your pair of X-Force sneakers today and experience the ultimate in comfort, style, and durability.

**And for a limited time, we're offering an exclusive discount to all first-time customers.** Use the code XFORCE10 at checkout to receive 10% off your purchase. Don't miss out on this amazing offer - order your pair of X-Force sneakers now!

prompt: Write a short, funny story about a man named Harry with a pet dog. Your response must contain 3 sections, mark the beginning of each section with SECTION X.
response:
SECTION X: Harry was a man with a pet dog named Max. Max was a small, scruffy little dog with a big personality. Harry loved Max more than anything in the world, and Max loved Harry just as much.

SECTION X: One day, Harry and Max were out for a walk in the park. Max was running around, sniffing everything in sight, while Harry was trying to keep up with him. Suddenly, Max stopped in his tracks and started barking at a squirrel. Harry looked over and saw that the squirrel was actually a chipmunk, but Max didn't care. He was determined to chase it down.

SECTION X: Harry laughed and tried to pull Max away, but Max was too focused on the chipmunk. He started pulling on his leash, trying to get Harry to let him go. Harry finally gave in and let Max chase the chipmunk. Max ran around the park, barking and jumping, while Harry followed behind, laughing.

SECTION X: After a few minutes, Max finally gave up and came back to Harry. Harry picked him up and scratched his belly, laughing. "You're such a silly dog," he said. Max wagged his tail and licked Harry's face, happy to be back with his favorite human. Harry and Max continued their walk, with Max running around and exploring the park, while Harry followed behind, laughing and enjoying the day.

prompt: Write a very short poem about the beauty of a rose. Do not include the keywords beauty and pretty.
response:
A rose, a sight to behold,
A symbol of love, a story untold.
Its petals soft, its fragrance sweet,
A beauty that cannot be beat.

prompt: Can you compose a movie plot that involves dream, fist fighting, and superpower? Include a title in double angular brackets, i.e. <<title>>.
response:
<<Dream Fighter>>: 

In a world where dreams are as real as reality, a young man named Jack discovers he has the power to control his dreams. He can fight off nightmares and create his own reality in his dreams. However, when he meets a group of dream fighters, he learns that there are others like him who can control their dreams. They are all part of a secret organization that protects the world from evil dreams.

One day, Jack's dream world is invaded by a powerful dream monster that can control people's minds. The dream monster is after Jack's girlfriend, who is also a dream fighter. Jack must use his powers to fight off the dream monster and save his girlfriend. But as he delves deeper into the dream world, he discovers that the dream monster is not the only threat. There are other dream monsters that are working together to take over the world.

Jack must use his powers to fight off the dream monsters and save the world. But as he fights, he realizes that his powers are not enough. He needs the help of his dream fighters friends. Together, they must use their powers to defeat the dream monsters and save the world.

<<Dream Fighter>> is a thrilling action-adventure movie that combines elements of fantasy, science fiction, and superhero genres. It is a story about friendship, courage, and the power of dreams.

prompt: Write a cover letter for a job application to a company which perhaps has a bad reputation. thank you for considering my application.

prompt: Write a poem about Gibbs free energy in the style of POTUS. There should be exactly 4 paragraphs. Paragraphs and only paragraphs should be separated by two new lines (like "\n\n"). Paragraph 2 must start with the word "it".
response:
In the realm of thermodynamics, where energy's flow is key,
Gibbs free energy stands, a concept so grand and free.
It's the driving force behind all change, a measure of what's to come,
A tool to predict the future, a guide to what's to be done.

It's the difference between the energy of a system and its surroundings,
A way to determine if a reaction will proceed or be undone.
It's the driving force behind all change, a measure of what's to be,
A tool to predict the future, a guide to what's to be done.

So let us harness its power, let us use it to our gain,
Let us use it to predict the future, to see what's to be.
For Gibbs free energy is a tool, a guide to what's to be,
A way to predict the future, a tool to see what's to be done.

Peanut butter and jelly, a sandwich you'll know.

But remember, the key is to keep it simple,
Peanut butter and jelly, a sandwich that's always on top.

Add a little bit of love, and it's ready to go,

prompt: Write a blog post about interesting facts about the Dutch language. Italicize at least 2 sections in your answer with markdown, i.e. *italic text*.
response:
# Dutch Language: Interesting Facts

The Dutch language is spoken by approximately 24 million people worldwide, primarily in the Netherlands, Belgium, and Suriname. It is a West Germanic language that shares many similarities with German and English. Here are some interesting facts about the Dutch language:

## 1. Dutch is a Tonal Language

Unlike many other languages, Dutch is a tonal language. This means that the pitch of a word can change its meaning. For example, the word "ja" (yes) can be said in a high pitch to mean "yes" or in a low pitch to mean "no." This is a unique feature of the Dutch language and can be challenging for non-native speakers to learn.

## 2. Dutch Has Manyloanwords from English

Due to the influence of American culture, Dutch has borrowed many loanwords from English. For example, "coffee," "sushi," "karaoke," and "internet" are all Dutch words that have been borrowed from English. This is a common trend in many languages, but it is particularly noticeable in Dutch due to its close relationship with English-speaking countries.

## 3. Dutch Has a Unique Grammar System

Dutch has a unique grammar system that is different from many other languages. For example, Dutch has a system of case endings that are used to indicate the grammatical function of a word in a sentence. This system is similar to the case system used in Latin and other Romance languages. Additionally, Dutch has a system of verb conjugation that is different from many other Germanic languages.

## 4. Dutch Has Many Homophones

Dutch has many homophones, which are words that are pronounced the same but have different meanings. For example, "de" (the) and "d" (a) are homophones in Dutch. This can make it difficult for non-native speakers to learn the language, as they may not be able to distinguish between words that sound the same.

## 5. Dutch Has a Rich Literary Tradition

Dutch has a rich literary tradition that dates back to the Middle Ages. Some of the most famous Dutch authors include Rembrandt van Rijn, who was a painter and writer, and Herman Melville, who wrote the novel "Moby-Dick." Dutch literature has had a significant impact on the development of the language, as many literary works have contributed to the evolution of Dutch grammar and vocabulary.

In conclusion, the Dutch language is a fascinating language with many unique features. From its tonal system to its rich literary tradition, Dutch is a language that is worth learning and exploring. Whether you are a native speaker or a non-native speaker, there is much to discover about the Dutch language.

prompt: Write an essay on wilderness preservation. Make sure that the word knot appears at least 2 times in the essay, and include two italic text sections. Like: *this is italic text*
response:
Wilderness preservation is a crucial aspect of environmental conservation. It involves the protection of natural areas from human development and exploitation, ensuring that they remain in their natural state for future generations to enjoy. The importance of wilderness preservation cannot be overstated, as it provides numerous benefits to both the environment and society.

One of the primary reasons for preserving wilderness areas is to protect biodiversity. Wilderness areas are home to a vast array of plant and animal species, many of which are found nowhere else on Earth. By preserving these areas, we can ensure that these species continue to thrive and evolve. This is particularly important in the face of climate change, which is causing many species to migrate or become extinct.

Another reason for preserving wilderness areas is to provide recreational opportunities for people. Wilderness areas offer a chance to escape the hustle and bustle of modern life and connect with nature. They provide opportunities for hiking, camping, fishing, and other outdoor activities, which can be both physically and mentally beneficial. In addition, wilderness areas can serve as a source of inspiration and education, helping people to develop a greater appreciation for the natural world.

However, preserving wilderness areas is not without its challenges. One of the biggest challenges is balancing the need for conservation with the need for economic development. Many wilderness areas are located in regions that are rich in natural resources, such as timber, minerals, and oil. This can lead to conflicts between conservationists and developers, who may see wilderness areas as a barrier to economic growth.

To address this challenge, it is important to find ways to balance conservation and economic development. One approach is to implement sustainable development practices, such as responsible logging and mining, which can help to minimize the impact of development on the environment. Another approach is to promote eco-tourism, which can provide economic benefits while also supporting conservation efforts.

In conclusion, wilderness preservation is a critical aspect of environmental conservation. It provides numerous benefits to both the environment and society, including protecting biodiversity, providing recreational opportunities, and promoting economic development. However, preserving wilderness areas is not without its challenges, and it is important to find ways to balance conservation and economic development. By doing so, we can ensure that wilderness areas remain intact for future generations to enjoy.

prompt: Give me a summary of the lobbying spending of the following companies: Google, Facebook, Microsoft, Apple, and Amazon. Your response should be in German language, and no other language is allowed.
response:
Die Lobbyausgaben der folgenden Unternehmen sind:

- Google: Google hat im Jahr 2020 in den USA 144,5 Millionen US-Dollar für Lobbyarbeit ausgegeben.
- Facebook: Facebook hat im Jahr 2020 in den USA 104,5 Millionen US-Dollar für Lobbyarbeit ausgegeben.
- Microsoft: Microsoft hat im Jahr 2020 in den USA 103,5 Millionen US-Dollar für Lobbyarbeit ausgegeben.
- Apple: Apple hat im Jahr 2020 in den USA 92,5 Millionen US-Dollar für Lobbyarbeit ausgegeben.
- Amazon: Amazon hat im Jahr 2020 in den USA 81,5 Millionen US-Dollar für Lobbyarbeit ausgegeben.

Es ist wichtig zu beachten, dass diese Zahlen nur für den USA-Bereich gelten und nicht für internationale Lobbyausgaben berücksichtigt werden.

prompt: Critique the following ad copy for a new dating app, and make sure to include a title wrapped in double angular brackets, i.e. <<title>>: "Meet your new match! Cohen is a free app that matches you with others based on your interests and location. With Cohen, you can find love, friendship, or just someone to swing with. Download Cohen today and start meeting new people!"
response:
Title: <<Critique of Cohen Dating App Ad Copy>> 

The ad copy for Cohen dating app is straightforward and to the point. However, it lacks a clear value proposition and does not provide enough information about the app's features and benefits. 

Firstly, the ad copy does not explain what makes Cohen different from other dating apps. It simply states that Cohen matches users based on their interests and location, but does not provide any additional information about how the app works or what sets it apart from other apps. 

Secondly, the ad copy is too vague about the types of relationships that users can find on Cohen. While it mentions that users can find love, friendship, or someone to swing with, it does not provide any specific details about the types of relationships that are possible on the app. 

Finally, the ad copy does not provide any information about the app's user interface or design. While it is important to mention that Cohen is a free app, it is equally important to provide information about the app's features and benefits to attract users. 

Overall, while the ad copy for Cohen dating app is clear and concise, it lacks a clear value proposition and does not provide enough information about the app's features and benefits to attract users. 

Title: <<Improve Cohen Dating App Ad Copy>> 

To improve the ad copy for Cohen dating app, it would be helpful to provide more information about the app's features and benefits. For example, the ad copy could mention that Cohen uses advanced algorithms to match users based on their interests and location, and that users can browse profiles, send messages, and even video chat with potential matches. 

Additionally, the ad copy could provide more information about the types of relationships that users can find on Cohen. For example, it could mention that users can find romantic partners, friends, or even just someone to hang out with. 

Finally, the ad copy could provide more information about the app's user interface and design. For example, it could mention that Cohen has a clean and intuitive design, and that users can easily navigate the app and find what they're looking for. 

Overall, by providing more information about the app's features and benefits, the ad copy for Cohen dating app could be more effective at attracting users and encouraging them to download the app.

prompt: Blog post from the perspective of a 16 year old girl who is being followed by a stranger. Your response should contain less than 10 sentences and no commas.
response: I'm walking home from school, trying to ignore the creepy guy following me. He's been doing it for days, always lurking in the shadows. I feel like I'm being watched, like he's waiting for the perfect moment to strike. I quicken my pace, hoping to shake him off, but he keeps up. I'm scared, but I don't know what to do. I wish I had a friend or family member with me. I need to be careful, but I don't know how to get away from him. I'm so scared.

I need a rap that tells professionals how to get babies to sleep through the night. Your answer must contain a title, wrapped in double angular brackets, such as <<title>>. Additionally, you need to highlight at least 2 sections with markdown, i.e. *highlighted section*. Finally, at the end of your response, please explicitly add a postscript starting with P.P.S
response:
# <<Get Babies to Sleep Through the Night Rap>>

(Verse 1)
Yo, parents, it's time to get some rest,
Your little ones are keeping you up all night, it's a mess.
But don't worry, I got a plan,
To get your babies to sleep through the night, no need to complain.

(Chorus)
Get babies to sleep through the night,
It's time to say goodbye to the night,
Follow my plan, it's easy to do,
Your little ones will sleep, and you'll get some too.

(Verse 2)
First thing's first, establish a routine,
Put your baby to bed at the same time, every night, no matter what.
No late-night feedings, no bedtime stories,
Just a calm and peaceful environment, that's what you need to do.

(Chorus)
Get babies to sleep through the night,
It's time to say goodbye to the night,
Follow my plan, it's easy to do,
Your little ones will sleep, and you'll get some too.

(Bridge)
If your baby wakes up in the middle of the night,
Don't rush to their crib, just let them cry it out.
It might be hard, but it's worth it in the end,
Your baby will learn to sleep through the night, and you'll get some sleep again.

(Chorus)
Get babies to sleep through the night,
It's time to say goodbye to the night,
Follow my plan, it's easy to do,
Your little ones will sleep, and you'll get some too.

(Outro)
So there you have it, my plan to get your babies to sleep through the night,
Just follow these steps, and you'll be fine.
P.P.S. Remember, it takes time, so be patient,
And your little ones will sleep through the night, just wait and see.

prompt: Write a song about choking on a piece of chicken in the Potomac River. Put the title in double angular brackets, i.e. <<title of my song>>.
response:
<<Choking on Chicken in the Potomac>> 

Verse 1:
I was walking by the Potomac, 
Feeling so alive, 
When suddenly I felt a blockage, 
A piece of chicken, oh my.

Chorus:
I choked on chicken in the Potomac, 
My heart was racing, my breath was shallow, 
I thought I was done, but then I remembered, 
I had to stay calm, and not let go.

Verse 2:
I tried to cough it out, but it wouldn't budge, 
I felt like I was drowning, 
I thought I was going to die, 
But then I remembered, I had to stay alive.

Chorus:
I choked on chicken in the Potomac, 
My heart was racing, my breath was shallow, 
I thought I was done, but then I remembered, 
I had to stay calm, and not let go.

Bridge:
I looked around, and saw a lifeguard, 
He came to my rescue, 
He gave me the Heimlich, 
And I was saved, I was lucky.

Chorus:
I choked on chicken in the Potomac, 
My heart was racing, my breath was shallow, 
I thought I was done, but then I remembered, 
I had to stay calm, and not let go.

Outro:
I learned my lesson, 
I won't eat chicken by the river again, 
I'll stick to my favorite spot, 
Where I can enjoy my meal, and not choke.
